author: Staff Reporter
text:
A section of students of Hindustan University on Old Mahabalipuram Road damaged the front office and a security officer’s room on Monday.

According to police sources, the students allegedly ransacked the front office, after they were asked by University authorities to pay fines for their earlier offences.

Though no one was injured in the attack, police teams rushed more personnel to restore peace on the campus.

It is said that there had been clashes between two groups of students earlier and there was tension as a result of this, police sources said.

Though no formal complaint was lodged with the police, personnel were guarding the entrance to the university for most part of the day, the police said.
title: Students destroy university offices
